website_summaries.verdict: This sound-only baby monitor has a good range and comes with 2 receivers and a talk-back feature.
pros: Gives you the ability to respond verbally to what you hear on the monitor
cons: This monitor sometimes has problems cutting out or failing to link

website_summaries.verdict: Provides the best representation of what your baby sounds like, as well as the best alert features.
pros: An impressive, inexpensive monitor with excellent sound quality, great range, and unmatched alert options
cons: With more options comes increased complexity

customer_reviews.title: Great Range!!!
customer_reviews.text: I tried 4 different Audio Only Monitors and this one by far works the best for Long Range!!! We have a 2500sqft home plus 5 acres of land. I need a monitor that I can take out side and work in the yard while baby is sleeping. Out of all 4 that I tried (summer infant, angel care, motorola, vtech), this Vtech one is the ONLY ONE that would let me go into my yard. Now it will not cover the entire 5 acres. I'd say it covers about 2 acres...then the out of range beeping starts.
customer_reviews.author: Midwest MamaTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Pair it with a Wifi Camera
customer_reviews.text: These have great range and do not have the lag that I've found with any wifi related product. They also have a much lower failure rate. So I use this in the babies room, and then got a $25 wyze cam. Together I have a video baby monitor for waaay less than a dedicated video monitor and I can reuse the camera once baby is old enough.
customer_reviews.author: justanengineer

customer_reviews.title: Bought for mother /caretakers friend.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother. I was my mothers care taker while she battled breast cancer and needed something so that I could hear her through the night or even while cleaning or just when in another room in general. I literally could hear changes in her breathing. As she got weaker, the sensitivity of their monitor prooved to be very helpful because she couldn't raise her voice above a whisper. This product was extremely helpful in allowing me the ability to give my mom the best care without feeling anxious I wouldn't be able to hear her when she needed me.
customer_reviews.author: J.P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product for monitoring and conversing with elderly.
customer_reviews.text: It has been in service continually since we got it. We use it to listen for my 90 year old mother in law (not a baby). It works great. I love the feature that allows my wife or me to talk to her Mom when she calls, or seems to need help. We have one receive station in the kitchen (downstairs from bedrooms) and one in our bedroom. This dual receiver capability is an excellent extra.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Seigneur

customer_reviews.title: Simple and reliable.
customer_reviews.text: I love these monitors. I bought them originally as a backup plan for my husband's fancy-pants Wifi-enabled nursery monitor security camera (which is completely unreliable, freezes or crashes or lags by several seconds on a regular basis), and we now use these as the PRIMARY monitor. They're ultra simple but super reliable, and the walkie-talkie feature is incredibly handy when one person is up in the room with the baby and we need to communicate. I'm buying a 2nd set for our master bedroom, where the little one sleeps overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Moore

customer_reviews.title: Decent product with major annoyances - Not Recommended
customer_reviews.text: We bought this since we also use a security camera and just needed audio in the new babies room. It worked fine for a while. Then suddenly, at random times, it started losing connection and beeping. Even just one room away it would do this, usually at night. I finally got so tired of being woken up by this sound that I bought the same exact ones again a few months ago. It immediately had the same issue. I can't help but determine that these units are poorly made in regards to connectivity. I would recommend finding another one to use as this problem becomes so annoying that we ended up leaving it off most of the time anyway.
customer_reviews.author: sTeaLth

customer_reviews.title: does the job but wouldn't purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product many times now as a baby monitor while traveling (we visit family often). While it does the job, the charging is ridiculous. The 2 battery monitors don't hold a charge and the main monitor that's placed worth your baby has to be plugged in to work (no battery). The monitors with batteries then have to switch with the main monitor to charge when not being used. It's a constant musical chairs of monitors to the single provided charger which is really inconvenient. But.... as I said, it does the job. For this product, price reflects quality. Okay but not great and I definitely won't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin McMorrow

customer_reviews.title: Amazon ’s price is the best price !!
customer_reviews.text: Not using for a baby, it's used in a restaurant! My cousin recommended it to me, used to talk with customers through windows during the Covid-19. We put the baby units outside, customers can speak directly without touching any buttons, I need to hold the ”talk” button speak to make my customers hear me !This intercom speaker is very sensitive ,this was an inexpensive solution that works out great. But one more thing, the battery ’s not good, so I chose to charge it all the time!
customer_reviews.author: HaaaaaShaw

customer_reviews.title: ANOTHER HONEST REVIEW fr PAT OSBORNE
customer_reviews.text: Very, Very good! Smaller than I thought. About the size of a cig pack. Easy. Didn't have to read directions! Works like a walkie talkie in that I can always hear Dad & before I can get to his room I can just press the button & tell him I heard him & I'm coming. Long range; GREAT BUY! NOW I HAVE A QUESTION. I'd like to give 94 yr old Dad a phone he can just hit ONE button & it calls me while I'm away so I can come home to help him if needed. ANY SUGGESTIONS? PLZ & THANK YOU.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Crappy.....didnt work after 1st use...wouldnt recharge
customer_reviews.text: Didnt even work for 2 days. The base baby unit worked fine but the parent units would not recharge a second time. I tried taking out reusable battery packs and putting them back in and still would not recharge....tried both cords. I got one days worth of use out of it and that is it. I returned it immediately for a refund and researched better products that cost a little more. Sometimes you get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.author: Domestic_Diva23

customer_reviews.title: Does not work if you use white noise for your kids
customer_reviews.text: This monitor works horribly if you use white noise for your kids. The sound constantly cuts in and out, which is very distracting particularly if you use it when trying to sleep. I kept this for one night and now I'm returning it for the summer baby monitor instead. I already had that one so I know it works.
customer_reviews.author: L. Rupar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely great!!! We have a two story house and I have not had an issue with these at all. I always keep one on the charger to always have a fully charged battery. They are very clear and the walkie talkie part works great as well. When my little one cries I respond immediately to her saying Mommy’s coming and she is always there happily waiting for me ❤️ Before she would be so upset by the time I made it to her 💔 so this is such a blessing being able to give her that security that Momma hears her and is coming!!! Love this system!!!
customer_reviews.author: Momma

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, awesome battery life
customer_reviews.text: We've only had these for about a week now but so far they are working fantastic. I actually got these because we have another monitor with a camera but the battery dies after about twenty minutes of being unplugged, not with this one. It doesn't have a camera but The battery lasts for almost 24 hours on a full charge, I'm super impressed. It has several sound sensitivity settings which work great. The sound alarm works great too. I love that you can turn the night light on from the parent unit. The only thing that could make it better is if the baby unit had a battery backup. But this is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: TessV84

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the volume
customer_reviews.text: I have an older Vtech baby monitor which worked better than my bluetooth speakers at long range, so I bought this new unit based on that experience. I use it not for baby monitoring, but to project my PC's reading of an audiobook into different rooms of the house. I was very disappointed to find that the maximum volume of the unit is quite low, not nearly as loud as my old unit. It's so low that it's difficult to hear over even minor noise like running water in the sink. The range seems to be fine, the clarity is fine, and it's too new to know about durability or battery life, but the volume is very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Bravo

customer_reviews.title: Great features and sound clarity.
customer_reviews.text: I have IP cam installed in the baby room, but I needed some basic sound monitor in addition to that. It’s easy to setup and excellent range. The audio quality is better than I expected. The fact that the unit has two receivers, so that I can install one in the living room and the other in the bedroom. It gives you the option to talk to your baby through the parent unit and it has a night light. It also has a vibration and sound alert that goes off when it detects noise. The battery doesn’t last too long. It has to charge constantly.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: This monitor is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My sister-in-law bought some cheap baby monitors when she had her child. They had a horrible range and were always staticy. After receiving this baby monitor and testing it, I can say this monitor is impressive. They have a great range, crystal clear with no static, and the microphone is so sensitive I can whisper in the hallway outside the room and hear it on the monitor. Our baby is a few weeks from arriving, but I am confident that these monitors will work just fine in detecting a fussy baby. I'll update the room after I get some real-world experience under my belt with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: In need of communicating with our elderly parent!
customer_reviews.text: Very very satisfied!! My Mother lives with us and this came the same day I ordered it as she came down with Vertigo and is 95 so we needed something that she didn’t need to work all she had to do is speak and we could hear her loud and clear anywhere in the house, on the patio and a short distance down the block which we were amazed.. Great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandee

customer_reviews.title: Great baby monitor!
customer_reviews.text: I actually purchased this baby monitor for my business, and it works great, the sound quality is good, you can adjust it to different level sound, Very clear sound! The best thing I like is that it comes with 2 mother unit, so that I can use it with different working place. I actually use them as intercome. But about the clip , I think it is not a good design, so I never use the clip . And if they can change the talk part to long talk button and stop talking button , it would be super cool!
customer_reviews.author: connie

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and works
customer_reviews.text: We decided to get an audio only monitor, because it doesn't utilize our WiFi. Plus it has a 1000 foot radius, which is bigger than our WiFi coverage. We have been very happy with this purchase. It is really easy to set up, just plug the main unit in and put the included battery pack into the parental units and plug them in. There is a nightlight feature, which we utilize quite often. The units have the ability to speak back, which we really just do for fun giving each other a hard time when we go to get the baby. Overall, we are very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Baby Monitor bought for Seniors to use.
customer_reviews.text: This doesn’t have a screen and don’t actually use the batteries since we leave plugged in all the time. Bought this for me and my husband to use since we sleep in separate rooms on opposite side of house. This way in case one of us gets sick, etc. and can’t get up, I can hear him , but he can’t hear me. Wish it worked both ways, but it is like a walky talky and we only have to push the button on the side to talk to each other. Works great and has a long range.
customer_reviews.author: GAM

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend- using for elder care
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for monitoring my elder Father in the house. Two receivers allow for one receiver in the kitchen and one upstairs for me in the night. VERY clear. The high mode picks up even his snoring (with monitor outside his bedroom) adjustments for less work great! I took a receiver outside to see distance, it was clear for the whole yard. They have a bigger town lot too! The receivers have a talk button so we use it like an intercom. This has put my mom at ease in the night knowing I will hear them if there is an emergency. I can’t speak to battery life as we keep them plugged in. I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Megg Rubbo

customer_reviews.title: Would not purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after my old Fisher Price monitor finally died and I’m very disappointed. One pro to these are there are 2 parent units. Otherwise there is nothing else I like. The baby unit does not pick up noise well at all. I’ve tried turning down the sensitivity so not as much background noise gets picked up but that didn’t help at all. If my toddler were to wake up in the middle of the night, I would NOT be able to hear him at all. The battery life isn’t the greatest, but I just keep it close to the cord so that part doesn’t bother me. I would not purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Connie-Marie Ringler

customer_reviews.title: The best solution for two parents
customer_reviews.text: I would give these six stars if I could. The battery lasts basically all day, the range is unimpeachable (our baby is at one corner of our 2nd floor, and it works perfectly fine from the basement on the opposite side of the house), and the functionality is dead simple and practical. The two handsets are always listening to the base station, but also work as walkie talkies to each other and back to the base station. My wife and I can use them to communicate with each other about who is taking care of it when the baby starts to cry. So good! Buy them!
customer_reviews.author: Drew Miller

customer_reviews.title: My wife and I both love it
customer_reviews.text: This baby monitor was exactly what I was looking for. My wife is disabled and sleeps in the anther room. I first bought a single unit and was so impressed with the sensitivity and sound quality that I immediately ordered one with two monitors.Her bed room sounds in my room and the one in the bathroom sounds in my bedroom and next to my chair in the living room. I tried and expensive intercom but it was too complicated and the sound sensitivity and quality were terrible and I had to return them. Thank you so much for such a great product and great price. Jay
customer_reviews.author: Jay Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Window visit problem solver
customer_reviews.text: My mom is in a Alzheimer’s/Dementia Memory Care Unit. When we have closed window visits it confuses her that I can be one the phone with her and outside, so she ignores me through the window and tells me “Some Lady” is knocking on the window. Today the visit was spectacular!!! She paid attention to me and was very talkative 😃 The facility was so impressed they are getting a unit of their own! Next visit I will give the staff inside the second parent unit so I can page it if my mom needs help for any reason. Totally happy with the set up & sound. I never had any problems at all. Excellent product and purchase!!!😃😃😃
customer_reviews.author: DeeDeeB

customer_reviews.title: Great Distance!
customer_reviews.text: This monitor has been fantastic! We are very active people, and being tethered to the house all day is no fun. This monitor allows us to listen in, even from a distance! We live on a bit of land, and have been working in our garden over a football field away from the house, and have still been connected!!! It allows the user to chanage the sensitivity settings, which is a lifesaver. My favorite feature is that the screen indicates if it is connected. If you lose connection, it will beep and display ‘not linked.’ Great product!
customer_reviews.author: William Fripp

customer_reviews.title: Battery degraded after 30 nights
customer_reviews.text: Battery lost capacity very quickly after just ~30 nights of use. Now lasts only four hours before low battery chime. Shame because we love everything else about these units. We're returning for replacement in the hopes this was just a rare manufacturing flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Christian  Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I have tried numerous monitors that always gave off horrible noises or loud background noises. This set is perfect. I love that I can leave a monitor on my nightstand and one in the living room and not worry about carrying a monitor around with me. There is no crazy fuzzy background noise. The range has also worked very well as well as battery life. I 10/10 recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Skipworth Family

customer_reviews.title: Better than walkie talkies
customer_reviews.text: I got this to monitor my wife who is totally blind and has to stay put by her talking book player. I can hear that it is playing correctly and she can call me without having to push buttons or anything with a walkie talkie . Sound is very clear, microphones very sensitive to all sounds in her room area. I can push a button to talk to her which she can hear good with the speaker in her unit.
customer_reviews.author: Verner E Laursen

customer_reviews.title: Sound Quality is Great
customer_reviews.text: I got these monitors for hear my elderly father (located on the main floor) at night if needed as we are on upper level and use a fan which blocks noise. You can talk back and forth as well. Two "parental" units provide us reassurance not only in our bedroom but in the family room as well. He stays up later than we do, so if he were to fall in the living area, he could call out for help. The quality is so good we can clearly hear Dad's TV shows.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hooks

customer_reviews.title: Strongly Recommend, especially for home health care.
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely recommend this monitoring system. I bought one when I moved my mother in my house for home care. The sound is crystal clear and the ability to use the Walkie-talkie style intercom is so handy... in my case to let Mom know I heard her and was on my way. Unfortunately, I also heard what I would consider poor care from a night nurse, but the upside was that I DID hear it and was able to immediately respond. I also like that it doesn't have visual monitoring for use with an adult.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Hall

customer_reviews.title: 1yr later and it still works great
customer_reviews.text: When we bought a 2 story house, I definitely needed a monitor for our 2nd child with bedrooms upstairs. If I go outside to let my older child play, the monitor reaches well if I am not too far from the house. We mainly keep the receiving end plugged in all the time. No camera, but it does have a talk back feature so we often use it ourselves if my husband is upstairs and I want to tell him something. Works great for us!
customer_reviews.author: Regina Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Simple is best
customer_reviews.text: We have learned the hard way that sometimes, simple is best, as is the case with this VTECH product. It has good range, adjustable sensitivity, and has been a god send in our sleep quality. While pregnant with our child (our first) we purchased the fancy video monitor that can connect to the net and be viewed on our phones. DO NOT do this if you live in an area without reliable internet over 20mbps. It DOES NOT work even if other tech such as streaming does. After a month of constant fiddling, purchasing wifi extenders, we finally gave up. Stick with tried and true tech. Bonus, it cannot be hacked like some of the newer, internet enabled monitors.
customer_reviews.author: Jbear

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and uncomplicated
customer_reviews.text: This baby monitoring system is exactly what we were looking for in that it's easy to use and doesn't require electricity or WiFi. We did not feel that a pricey, complicated, video monitoring system was necessary as we only live in a 2500 square foot house so if we hear the baby fuss or cry, we can very easily walk into the room to check on her. Plus if our internet or electricity goes out as it sometimes does in south Florida weather, we can still monitor our baby. It can also easily be taken to another location and quickly set up there without complication.
customer_reviews.author: Heather DTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Use them for our dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Our bedroom is on the opposite side of the house from the doggie bedroom in our den. They are aging, just as we 70++ year olds are, and usually need to go out before morning. These are perfect! We keep 1 in our bedroom and one in the living room and the main one in their room. They work just as we wanted. If they arouse, one of us hears and it makes us feel good to know we can hear and respond.
customer_reviews.author: Ritakc

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected.  Stopped using my wifi camera
customer_reviews.text: I have been using a wifi camera, but found this to be the most useful way to monitor the baby. Once I hear a sound from the audio baby handset I can wait to see if the baby self-soothes. If successful I go back to bed. If the noise continues , I can switch on my wifi camera app and take a look. The audio baby handset is only useful if you are far enough away or have nice solid doors preventing a clear sound of a baby crying. Having two handsets is convenient
customer_reviews.author: SummerBreeze

customer_reviews.title: Excellent battery life!
customer_reviews.text: Went through several monitors before buying this one. Wish I would have seen this one first. Although we use it for our puppy and not a baby, it was perfect for our needs. I would recommend this product to anyone, even new moms! Sound/clarity is great and I can’t even give enough stars for battery life! I purchased the package with 2 receivers & base because it was only a couple bucks more and contrary to other reviews, mine DID come with 3 chargers for each piece. Again, highly recommend this monitor!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for us!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t spend more on the fancier options for monitors! We just needed sound and not video so it was perfect. We get two hand held monitors so both parents can have one. With a two story home, it helps us hear the babies when we are downstairs. The devices also operate like a walkie talkie which is handy. The only down side is that the battery runs down quickly. You have to keep them charged up everyday.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Great non-video monitor
customer_reviews.text: We throw these in the diaper bag when we are going somewhere like a friends or our parent’s house and the baby will be napping in a pack n play in another room. Sometimes I’ll use it if the baby is home and just napping in a different room. It’s a nice inexpensive option so we can leave the video monitor put in the nursery. Although, if you don’t care about having a video monitor this would be great for your everyday use! The two parent units are great. Night light glow is a nice touch too.
customer_reviews.author: Hermione Granger

customer_reviews.title: 1 parent unit doesn’t work. Not portable! Awful battery life
customer_reviews.text: I thought that these were fully portable, but they are not. The baby unit MUST be plugged into an electrical outlet. So much for using them when camping. The parent units are portable but the battery life is awful! The highest volume is not very high at all, though the sound quality (clarity) is very good. Update: we moved baby into his room so I got out the 2nd parent unit (to have one in our bedroom and one in the living room). The second parent unit doesn’t work. It will not link. I’ve tried everything!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie J.

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: Absolute life saver! I keep the main unit by the bed, and my neighbor keeps one just in case. My partner can hear me when I press the talk button on the side of the unit which has brought so much comfort and saved time. The beaters lasts long as well. A few nights I’ve forgotten to plug my talk unit in, and awoke to a low battery but still operational. I was thankful both times that the battery hasn’t died in the middle of the night from not having plugged it in.
customer_reviews.author: Becks

customer_reviews.title: Reliability Issues
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately there aren't very many options for audio only baby monitors; and this VTech set is the best one we can find. However, we've had to repurchase this set 3 or 4 times because the parental units will begin having connection failures after about two years of use. Very disappointing. The new set we just purchased began having connection failures immediately. Hopefully the replacement will last more than a day.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Very good, especially for the money
customer_reviews.text: they work long distances, are easy to use. I would get two parent unit ones. I wish we could hook up multiple monitors to our parent units though... but i'm not sure if that exists. Paging/talk button works well. Battery lasts a long time. I deal I guess. Don't get the one that takes batteries even though its cheaper. You don't want to constantly replace AAAs
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Dalos

customer_reviews.title: Perfect baby monitor
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe how well these work! I can even hear background noise from the TV. Definitely glad I got the second parent control version. Easily plugs in to charge overnight and ready for all day use the next day. We leave one on the back porch in case we go in and out. Includes lights as noise indicator too in case you have the volume down low, which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Trey

customer_reviews.title: Not Just for Babies.! Life Saver.
customer_reviews.text: I have major surgery coming up and I have been resting a lot because of pain. I would have to scream for my husband to hear me when I needed help ~ which ended up making my throat sore. I am so glad he told me to order this! It has a base and TWO hand held (works like a walkie talkie) so he and or son can hear.. This has been a life saver.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia S. Willard

customer_reviews.title: Parent Unit(s) lose charge fast!-- Very low fidelity sound
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as an experiment to listen to birds in feeder near window during cold weather. Everything works, but: 1. Sound quality is awful--if my wife goes outside and speaks near baby monitor, her voice sounds like a very bad connection on a cell phone with limited frequency distribution. This translates, for bird song like an old 78rpm toy record player. 2. "Rechargeable" parent units, for all intensive purposes, must be kept plugged in at all times--full charge lasts 6-8 hrs. Guess if you are using this to detect crying babies, it will work, but not for deciphering baby talk. It's even worse for bird song.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B. Ash

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic while it works.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about a year, then started losing connection every night. This was my second attempt at using this monitor - first set also began losing connection a little over a year after purchase. I’d hoped it was just a glitch, but same exact thing happened with my second set. Otherwise, it’s the best working audio monitor I’ve found, with the best sensitivity setting. I’ve purchased a slightly different model (dm223) and a protection plan, in hopes I’ll avoid the dreaded “NOT LINKED” beep all night.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Z

customer_reviews.title: great and economical
customer_reviews.text: Using for Senior citizen. Great Noise level Cont cannot hear TV in background , Clear Sound. Have to charge battery everyday is only Con, but that really not a problem. Well worth the Money
customer_reviews.author: cindymuzny

customer_reviews.title: Not Just For Babies, Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my elderly mother who just had a stroke. We live on the second floor and she is on the first floor. These are an easy way for her to call us or tell us if she needs something. I purchased these for the feature of being able to talk back, intercom feature. The volume is loud enough. I have brought the parent unit outside with me , it has an excellent range. Reasonably priced for what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle A Ray

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these baby monitors to alert me when my Lab was awake in her crate at night so I only use them on an average of 5 hours per night and yet I have to recharge them EVERY time I use them. The battery life is awful and it's just a good thing I have two of them so I can switch off and on each day. The volume only goes up to a five so there's not much ranger there either. I would NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Watch the battery
customer_reviews.text: I receive my product but it looked like it was a returned item. The monitors were not charged and had to charge them, with in a day the battery drained and had to charge again. The sound is very good. I can hear breathing that is how good it is. Words on the Screen are very light. Different type of print. Should of made it more bold maybe. It works for me. Frustrated with the battery life. But thankful there are two parent units. We use it more for my someone who had a stroke, I can hear him if he needs help.
customer_reviews.author: Sunnyside

customer_reviews.title: Very practical device to keep informed of baby cry
customer_reviews.text: If your baby cries when intervention is needed (e.g., she woke up, she pooped), this is very handy. Good sound quality, versatile notification (directly hear the sound, or just deliver visual/beep warning to the parent units). It's more reliably connected than wifi-based monitors. It doesn't have any hissing noise, which exists for many non-Wifi video monitors.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Can't even hear nap time music.
customer_reviews.text: I can't even hear the nap time music. The 20 yr old fisher price I had I could hear breathing. On this the sound breaks up every other second because of bad connection and it doesn't pick up low noises such as a child turning in their crib.... Doesn't stay linked one floor away. Absolutely does not work if you have to go up two floors. Battery life wears out in under two hours. TERRIBLE PRODUCT. Does not make you feel that children are safe...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Works , but sound isn’t consistent. The monitor is constantly getting loud then really quiet. I have to keep the volume on 3 or it continues to wake me up in night because it will be so loud at times. My son sleeps with the Dohm sound machine , so the monitor picks up on the sound which is fine, except for the waves of really loud sound throughout the night , very annoying that I must listen to it on 3.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Works, when plugged in...
customer_reviews.text: These worked fine for our occasional use in home (we got an Arlo pretty quickly). Never dropped or spilled upon, I was excited to take them camping and actually get to use them, but was irritated to discover that the parent unit only works when plugged in. I suspect my batteries are defective, in spite of the gentle use. Would be great if someone from Vtech reached out with a solution, I'd be happy to update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Randomly loses link/connection causing warning tones in the middle of the night
customer_reviews.text: When this works, it works well. Picks up enough sound to keep an eye on my toddler and allows us to talk to him and check in when needed. However, both parental units randomly lose the link to the baby unit, frequently doing so at night which wakes us up as there is an audible alarm when the parent units aren't linked. After a minute of the alarm, the units reconnect. This happens periodically through the night (and day). Incredibly frustrating to be woken up by a malfunctioning monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S.

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love this monitor! I didn't want a video monitor because I find it creepy with all the news about people spying on your baby. I got this monitor for when we transitioned our son to his own room. It has some great features such as different sensitivity levels, vibration, and it has a great range. It comes with two parent units, which is really helpful if you have a multi-floor home.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This acts like a walky talky so that you can reassure your kids when they are calling for you that you are indeed on the way. The sound is clear so it's easy to hear what's going on, and you can adjust the sound. The units are sturdy and well made. The battery lasts about a day (from morning to night, it's dead by night time) so I just keep them plugged in all the time. This has made the transition from my 3 year old being in our room to hers downstairs so much eaier and much less stressful.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: got this for my mom
customer_reviews.text: She was falling because she kept trying to get up on her own if no one heard her. Now she presses the PAGE button and either my daughter or myself come to her aid.
customer_reviews.author: Luann Norfleet

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade to an old style baby monitor.
customer_reviews.text: These work very well and have a great feature that you can "page" the parent unit even if it's volume is turned to 0. We also like the "talk" feature. It's nice for the baby to know we're on the way and she settles down when she hears our voice. For us, this is better than the nanny cam.
customer_reviews.author: Carl W.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: We are very impressed with the quality of this monitor for the price. Sometimes with monitors there is a 1-2 glitch before the sound comes through but this one picks up the sound immediately, and from a good distance too. Battery life is greay and the parent units are easy to take along. Love that it has the walkie talkie feature.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best audio monitors I’ve owned
customer_reviews.text: Love it! No static, interference, doesn’t cut out, self connects to the base, hassle free. Has a buzz/vibrate mode which is perfect if you’re a deep sleeper like me. If your an exhausted parent and can sleep through a baby’s cry, the monitor can be set to vibrate and well, which will wake me. No issues with these at all!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because A. it was cheap and B. it said it had a really good range. I've been so impressed! I can take the receivers outside, upstairs, anywhere in my house and hear the baby. Or I can turn the volume all the way down and "see" the noise level thanks to the lights. I also love the soft nightlight on the base.
customer_reviews.author: Erica E. Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Super Quiet. No static.
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe it took me so long to replace my old monitor. I have a need in my family to keep constant monitoring of one of our bedrooms. We lived with an older staticky monitor for years. Finally, after the old monitor kept me up all night by making beeping noises I went looking for a replacement. I hate that I did not buy this monitor sooner. It is super quiet. There is no static whatsoever. You only hear what you need to hear. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitri Furman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Audio Monitor
customer_reviews.text: I am a caregiver for elderly patients. This new addition to my daily tools really helped my most recent client and I communicate without infringing on his privacy. This would be awesome for parents as well. I have another set of monitors that has the video feed, yet one can become a slave to watching the screen! This unit worked great for me and my client.
customer_reviews.author: AJBoris43

customer_reviews.title: Works well in very large houses!
customer_reviews.text: I live in a big house...3 stories, steel construction. I can hear the baby sounds from the top story clearly on the monitor all the way downstairs and even outside. My only wish for improvement is I wish the monitor unit that stays with baby could operate on a battery life like the two parent units.
customer_reviews.author: D. J.

customer_reviews.title: glad I upgraded to this set
customer_reviews.text: Just recieved these and everything is going great so far. I am very happy with this set and especially love the talk back option so I can talk back to my toddler or grandmother whenever we use them. They connect easily and sound quality is great would definantly recommend especially the fact that they have rechargeable batteries for the 2 parent relievers is awesome. No double or triple a batters required
customer_reviews.author: Emily Linz

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money and feels safer to have this around
customer_reviews.text: I’m happy to have purchased this item helps me keep an ear on the baby constantly. It’s good to have the baby in its room and Be able to peacefully work outside the room. Since there are two Parent units can be either stretched to different rooms or switch between one unit to another if battery runs out. Volume and voices are pretty clear; in fact at the highest volume it sounds more than it actually is.
customer_reviews.author: Hrsh

customer_reviews.title: Love the walkie-talkie capability!
customer_reviews.text: Great monitors! They work perfectly for our needs - which is a combination of monitoring and using as a walkie-talkie between rooms in the house. ;o) It wasn't clear in the description that they came with adapters for the receivers, so I purchased separately: not needed! While I understand why it's there, we could do without the "not linked" beeping that happens when the transmitter is turned off/disconnected. Our receivers are on 2 different floors, so running to turn them off to stop the beeping is a bit annoying. That said, the monitors are awesome - I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: solunamama

customer_reviews.title: Battery vs. cord
customer_reviews.text: I really like this monitor for our baby! I like that you have the option to hear every little sound that they make or to set it lower and only hear if they are crying. It is also nice that you can talk through it as well but we haven’t had to use that feature yet. The one thing that I wish was different about it is that the parent parts have rechargeable batteries but the baby part doesn’t. So anywhere you want to place the baby end of the monitor it has to be plugged into the wall. Other than that we have loved using this monitor so far!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: These work great as a Mother Monitor, too.
customer_reviews.text: These work great. Good sound clarity with out picking up too much ambient sound. We have the monitor in about the middle of our home and a receiver at each end, approx. 88' apart. Works just fine. My only complaint is that the rechargeable batteries that came with the receivers were not good to begin with and have already died. I rarely unplugged them to use portably, but if I want to I will have to replace the rechargeable batteries myself. Not a problem, but very disappointing to need to do it so soon. Otherwise I would give these 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: G. Kent

customer_reviews.title: Great to keep an ear out on your love one
customer_reviews.text: My mom is bed ridden and my dad is getting older. They live behind me and this so helps me keep an ear on them. The other receiver is with my dad so he can hear my mom. It has helped a lot. The only thing I would change is the sound is much softer when you unplug it from power. Other then that is great.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Maniscalco

customer_reviews.title: Long range and long lasting battery
customer_reviews.text: New parents do yourself a favour and forget about getting a video monitor. This package is really great. I can be working in my backyard 100ft away from monitor unit and have perfect reception on the parent unit. Battery charge lasts several hours though I’ve never actually tested the exact time. Having two parent units is handy if you live in a two floor home, or we keep our 2nd in our shed/shop. No indication that rechargeable batteries are short on life either. You won’t be sorry making this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Okanagan Outdoorsman

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am super pleased with this monitor. We have a video monitor for our newborn but it needs to be open on our phone screens to be heard so we wanted a sound monitor to alert us when she makes noise. It's easy to use and works well, the sound drops for like 3 seconds every half hour or so but it really doesn't affect what we use it for. I am very happy with this purchase and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kenna/Thomas

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY MORE THAN ONE OF THESE UNITS
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful monitor, we loved it so much we bought another. These monitors' signals interfere with each other and make them lose connection (making an annoying beeping sound in the process). If you want only 1 monitor this is the best audio only monitor we could find. The monitors ability to filter out white noise is AWESOME! The features are great, good battery life, vibrate, and it's incredibly reliable...as long as there is only one of them.
customer_reviews.author: Suebie

customer_reviews.title: Uses Rechargeable batteries
customer_reviews.text: I returned the VTech DM111 that didn’t use rechargeable batteries as the parent unit needed batteries replaced for every four hours of use. I use this product (VTech DM222-2) for my new puppy. It works well and the rechargeable battery stays charged for more than 24-48 hours. Excellent product and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: BethanyLiz

customer_reviews.title: Works well for the most part
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to use. If you have a white noise machine that plays thunder and rain, it will pick up some static, but not if it's just rain. There was one time when we thought it was paired successfully but wasn't. Never happened again though. Battery life on parent unit lasts about the full day. Overall pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: icyp3nguin

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: father on aucution and mobility limited use it when mom goes grocery shopping and has to leave him at home I sleep during day and we leave unit in room so he can call for help if needed my brother lives next door and he also uses unit and it works for him
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase for the baby room
customer_reviews.text: We used to have a really fancy monitor that had the video camera and worked on the WiFi. Problem is that the WiFi would cut out every so often and we would lose all connection with the baby room. With these monitors from VTech we are always able to hear the baby and being able to talk to the baby on the way to their room is really nice too. I would highly recommend these monitors to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Margi N.

customer_reviews.title: great unit..
customer_reviews.text: I take care of my aging mother. Terrific unit. If I am in the basement I simply talk into the parent unit to see if she is doing OK, The baby unit is set up on a table close to her recliner. She does NOT have to handle the unit--just simply speak. This is my main feature: she does not have to handle, grasp, or hold the unit--just talk from her position and I hear her. Awesome! Many thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Sound Quality is really good
customer_reviews.text: I can hear the baby breathing. Seriously the sound quality is out of this world. It also works for a long distance. I can walk about 100' down the road and still maintain connection. Which is like 300' from the room. I take the other kids on a walk while the other is napping. Also, it beeps at you if you go to far away and loose connectivity. So you know right away if you've walked to far away and need to turn around.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey J. ;)

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this so we could hear our elderly grandmother in the middle of the night should she not feel well. Set up was easy and we have been using it for over a week and it works perfect. We do not hear every little thing, but if she calls for us we hear her perfectly. We can also talk to her through the devise to check on her. Just what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: too quiet
customer_reviews.text: there appears to be a noise gate or limiter that keeps the white noise in the nursery from overwhelming the sound. however, the noise gate doesn't always kick off when the baby cries, meaning we don't always wake up quickly. we only kept it because it's our backup in case the wifi goes down and takes the camera with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loses connection too often
customer_reviews.text: The ‘parent’ units lose their connection with the ‘baby’ unit all the time randomly. Then to notify you that it’s not linked it starts this annoying chirp. Not fun getting woken up in middle of the night unnecessarily. Otherwise when it does work it does a good job of alerting you only when it’s a ‘real’ sound with the sensitivity settings
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Crystal Clear
customer_reviews.text: These are GREAT. There is no feedback sound with any of the speakers whatsoever (unless they are held closely together, obviously). The talk feature is a must have. The battery life is okay. It can last all night without having to be plugged in, but I wish it lasted a bit longer. They sync very quickly and they sound is crystal clear. The volume goes from 1-5 and is definitely loud enough, I typically keep it on 3.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: 2.5/5☆ because 1/2 works great
customer_reviews.text: I really like the one (of this set of 2) that works properly. Unfortunately, the other one only flashes, responds to no stimuli, and the phone number included on the owner manual has been discontinued. What's up with that Vtech? Now I get to wait for an email? Sadly, I ordered the 2 pack because I actually need 2 at once.
customer_reviews.author: L. K. Alagna

customer_reviews.title: Plays Vtech message at random times
customer_reviews.text: At random times, one of the parent units will automatically go from “sound off” to playing an automated message about Vtech at volume 3. Not great for nap time (we have two kids, one in our bedroom and the other in his own room), as this disturbs the baby in our room.
customer_reviews.author: Knitty

customer_reviews.title: Battery sucks. Some feedback. Serves it's purpose.
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the sound on our video monitor, so I bought these to supplement. The battery life sucks, so we keep them plugged in on the nightstand. There is some feedback, but we have a sound machine in the nursery, so the feedback doesn't bother us. You can adjust the sensitivity level to help with the feedback issue. They serve our purpose.
customer_reviews.author: S M

customer_reviews.title: Sound goes out every 30 seconds or so
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 5 months and the return window closed. The parent monitors intermittently go in and out so there are times where there’s no sound. I’ve moved it closer to the baby monitor and still this problem occurs. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Grey

customer_reviews.title: First look review !!
customer_reviews.text: This is a first look review with one day of use. Product material is good and looks high quality . Sound is not very clear sometimes . But works most of the time . Connectivity between parent and child unit is good and I didn’t face any issue yet . When child unit is off , all parent unit starts making annoying alarm . This should have some other sound or should stop beeping after few seconds, but it doesn’t . Apart from this , no major issues with the product . Will post final update on battery life, sound quality and connectivity after one month of use.
customer_reviews.author: Abhishek

customer_reviews.title: Frequently Come Unlinked
customer_reviews.text: This is our second set of monitors from VTech, because the first ones came unlinked all the time and eventually became unreliable. We thought perhaps it was just a fluke. Well, these are the same way. No matter where we put them in the house, they become unlinked and are rendered useless until becoming linked again. I wouldn’t recommend them at all - they’re too unreliable. I’m very disappointed in them.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: We needed a baby monitor with just sound because the camera ones we had used too much battery on our phones to keep the app open all night. The sound is great and I usually keep the volume level on the lowest level because I’m a light sleeper and wake up as soon as our baby starts making noise. I do have to charge it after every night but since it comes with two receiving end monitors, I can always use the other if I’ve forgotten to charge one. Overall a great purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Intercom feature
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set because it had an intercom feature. I live in one house and my daughter lives next-door. The monitors definitely worked. If something happens to me, I can make a noise and she will tell me she is coming over. These monitors are not just for babies.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Baby Monitor
customer_reviews.text: These monitors are awesome. I replaced a set of Sony monitors that had a ridiculous amount of feedback and constant static. These monitors have great range, are super crisp, and do not have any feedback or background static. The only drawback is that the receivers, when not plugged in, do not last super long on the charge. They come with three AC adaptors so I'm not sure why you would ever need to leave them unplugged for long durations.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Eric

customer_reviews.title: Such a helpful tool
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put in our bedroom so I could hear when my husband needed help. He needs help to get out of bed and I am slightly hard of hearing and could not hear when he called me or used the bell. This monitor has been a lifesaver; I don't have to check on him every 20 minutes because I can hear everything from the bedroom now. Thank you for an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Moshell

customer_reviews.title: Useful for small crying kids only
customer_reviews.text: Very useful tool when we leave the sleeping baby alone in the bedroom. The sound is clear to alert us after baby wakes up. However, as my son grows to 9 months old, he doesn’t cry but directly sit up when he wakes up from his nap. I realize that I still need a video monitor to check my baby now.
customer_reviews.author: FennyL

customer_reviews.title: Not just for Babies
customer_reviews.text: Sorry I didn't mean to mark the battery, because I'm not using it. These stay pulled in because my Mom had a stroke and I am caring for her. I refuse to let her go to the rehap center that she was at the first time. It was terrible. This time I was prepared to care for her myself. With the right tools such as the baby monitor has been extremely helpful in caring for her. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: CJ Smith

customer_reviews.title: Clear audio, but poor battery life
customer_reviews.text: Very clear audio on this baby monitor and decent range too. We use it when visiting relatives. Two cons: (1) poor battery life on the parental units - they don’t seem to hold a charge well, I leave one charging all the time. (2) baby unit does not have a battery and must be plugged in to the wall for use - not too terrible, but an outlet is not always convenient. Even with these cons, I would still recommend this for certain situations.
customer_reviews.author: Christine R

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This was just what we were looking for in a baby monitor. We keep one parent unit in the living room and one in the bedroom. The range is great and the sound quality is very impressive. The battery life is much better than I was expecting. I have noticed that the battery does die quicker when the units are unplugged and turned off. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a simple baby monitor without all the bells and whistles.
customer_reviews.author: lmk819

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to use for my bedridden mom. I’m very pleased with them! I can turn the base on near her and take one of the parent units with me outside to garden (I did purchase the two-parent model, giving me two portable units). Quality is great, sound is audible and not fuzzy. Handsets are lightweight and not bulky. This has given me some freedom again!
customer_reviews.author: Tommie

product_meta.title: VTech DM221-2 Audio Baby Monitor with up to 1,000 ft of Range, Vibrating Sound-Alert, Talk Back Intercom, Night Light Loop & Two Parent Units
product_meta.description: Digital Audio Monitor with two parent units with DECT 6.0 digital technology provides crystal clear transmission, eliminating the annoying white noise you hear from analog monitors. Extended Range Up to 1,000 feet of range allows you to feel safe and connected to your child while you go about your day. Talk-Back Intercom System Remotely communicate to your baby from the parent unit to the baby unit. Soothe your baby from another room or even from outdoors.
feature_bullets: DECT 6.0 digital technology eliminates background noise & prevents interference
Vibrating sound alert & backlit display on the parent unit
5-level sound indicator helps to monitor room noise level even with the unit muted

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars3,728 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
